entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
